channel.title: Black Ops - Buy a mic!
channel.description:
I'm getting sick of searching for a match with four people who actually have a mic. If I ever do find a match with people who have mics there all 10 years old screaming down the mic at me and then once it starts they run up to the window I'm at with a shotgun at round 1 and blast like 20 shots into 1 zombie.
Treyarch really need to make a filtering system or at least an option to search for people with a mic. If anybody wants to play zombies and your not mentally challenged add me: a Ma G ii K zZz :)

item.title: Black Ops - Buy a mic!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“theowned, post:8, topic:371264”]black ops is not that good as mw2 say many people
i whas also thinking you need to play it about 3 weeks and this game is awesome you will play so much ass you can[/quote]
What…

@OP, it’d probably be best if you just decided to play Zombies alone or with a few friends, it seems pointless otherwise.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops - Buy a mic!
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:4, topic:371264”][quote author=John459 link=topic=467351.msg3417675#msg3417675 date=1291245434]
There’s a mute option that can be quite helpful.
[/quote]
Na I chose to go outside[/quote]Don’t post near useless posts here, not worth ours or your time.

Anyways, I never use my mic online unless I’m in a party, I could go without the little kiddies screaming and all the black guys (no offense to any black people here) thinking they’re tough shit and telling everyone off.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops - Buy a mic!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:1, topic:371319”]Don’t use a mic on black opps, I threw mine out because some guy was stalking me and every game he asked if I would rub his “magic wand” and make some “mayo”. Long story short I don’t like being verbally molested. I like cheese, is that how you spell it, boobies. Shit I forgot the topic.[/quote]Oh your just the funniest aren’t you?

And I didn’t know you had a mic whipz, we are going to date online now!

Read full topic
